summary: An ordinance relating to the sale of meats intended for human consumption, as defined by Ordinance 61098, as amended; amending Section 1, 2, 2-1, 7, 7-1, 8, 9, 10, 14-d, 14-e, 17 and 20-0 of said ordinance to define "Retail Processed Meat Shop", redefine "Meat Salesman", and "Meat Handler", and increase license fees in such connection.
